Key Match Events: India beat Sri Lanka by 62 runs
Openers Rohit Sharma and Kishan added 111 runs in 11.5 overs
Shreyas Iyer provided late fireworks with 57 not out
Pre-Game Insights: India are yet to be beaten in T20Is in the new full-time captaincy era under Rohit Sharma
Sri Lanka are without Wanindu Hasaranga as the leg-spin all-rounder hasn’t recovered yet from Covid-19 infection
India will be hoping that the return of Jasprit Bumrah and Ravindra Jadeja will boost the experience in the hosts’ camp
Post-Match Reflections: Dasun Shanaka, Sri Lanka skipper, will be looking for his top order to fire
India will be looking to continue their winning juggernaut against Sri Lanka in the series
Miscellaneous Highlights: The series promises to be a clash between a team on a winning run and a side trying to discover their batting potential
The pace department looks good with Dushmantha Chameera, Lahiru Kumara and Chamika Karunaratne
